title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Zion, Lakers, Aaron Rodgers
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Zion, Lakers, Aaron Rodgers
description:
Colin believes Pelicans F Zion Williamson is better than we thought, says Packers QB Aaron Rodgers' skills are fading fast, and wonders what Lakers F Anthony Davis will do in the playoffs.


Guest: Doug Gottlieb

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
